name: Where the tumbleweeds die.
description:
A little game I created  with the  bitsy game maker for the storytelling class during my university studies.

It is a linear, narrative driven experience with simple game mechanics loosely following the dramatic structure of Aristoteles’s tragedy using the three-act-structure. The game handles many of the classic western tropes and tries to lean heavily into the literary repertoire of that genre.

Playtime: 5-10 min.
Dialog and movement through arrow keys or WASD

Music by Andrewfai from Pixabay; embedded through mark wonnacott's audio tool
